content: advent amy loves to dress up these easy crochet doll sun hat is designed to fit my advent amy doll find the free doll pattern here 1 this pattern includes both a written pattern and a step-by-step video tutorial and is accessible for beginners this project is part of the amigurumi advent calendar crochet along learn more about the cal here https //theloopylamb com/2022/01/07/amigurumi-advent-calendar-crochet-along/ **follow me on social media to see behind the scenes of new ** upcoming designs and giveaways **instagram ** www instagram com/theloopylamb **facebook ** www facebook com/theloopylamb **pinterest ** www pinterest com/theloopylamb **youtube ** check out my youtube channel 2 **blog ** www theloopylamb com **disclaimer ** feel free to sell the item created by this pattern but please provide pattern credit back to me when posting online and please provide a link to my blog http //www theloopylamb com please do not resell distribute duplicate or share this pattern in any printed or digital form or claim this pattern as your own original design please do not use my photos when selling your finished items please note that due to the nature of digital downloads i do not offer refunds on the purchase of digital downloads if you have any questions at all about the pattern please feel free to send me a message through ravelry or via email ashley@theloopylamb com 1 https //theloopylamb com/2022/01/14/easy-crochet-doll-tutorial/ 2 https //www youtube com/channel/ucd4hdqudbfqqbbgm-bo7myg
